hackathon-description-text: Robotics based  hackathon hosted in Montreal Canada.
hackathon-eligibility: Everyone with attending CEGEP, College, or University may apply  to attend.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Four (or five) Myo Armbands, one per member, each valued at 250 CAD.
Four year-long subscriptions to the Jet Brains development suite.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Software Project - Jet Brains Suite
Ready for Market Prize - Ready for Market Prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Awarded to the team that truly embodies the spirit of the "hack" and uses something in an ingenious and way to achieve their desired end.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=51 Rue Sherbrooke O, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: This describes a project that is professional, complete, and useful. Something that could be boosted into further development.

hackathon-location-address: 51 Rue Sherbrooke O, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
